originalText.text: I have been working with this company just about a month, providing psychotherapy to   residents of an assisted living facility. I enjoy the ability to set my own schedule with the residents. The CEO and other SLBH staff have been very supportive of and accessible to  this "newbie." I appreciate that the documentation is done on my own time and is facilitated by a user-friendly data base. As I mentioned, I have just started, and look forward to a  happy continuing relationship with this company.

originalText.text: I have been working with Senior Living Behavioral Health (SLBH) for a few months now and it has been a wonderful experience.  Everyone has been very helpful as I began this new job, making it a smooth transition.  I was provided with computer training to learn the electronic medical records before I began seeing clients.  Working with SLBH has provided me with flexibility with my work schedule, which has been perfect for my situation.  I see my clients at the assisted living facility and I complete the progress notes at home, at my convenience. Compared to previous clinical positions I have held, the paperwork is a lot less time consuming and there are no required evening and weekend hours.  I enjoy working with the clients at the facility and I am very grateful to have this opportunity working with SLBH.

originalText.text: This is a fabulous company to work for!  Flexibility is the key; you can work as much or as little as you want.  Make your own schedule and work with wonderful people!  Evan is always available and super supportive!  Locations all around NY state.
